definitions.definition: a thin flat case used for carrying documents, drawings, etc.

examples.text: I left my portfolio on the train.

definitions.definition: a collection of photographs, drawings, etc. that you use as an example of your work, especially when applying for a job

examples.text: She spent most of last year getting her portfolio together.

definitions.definition: a set of shares owned by a particular person or organization
the particular area of responsibility of a government minister

examples.text: He was asked to join as a **minister without portfolio** *(= one without responsibility for a particular government department)*.

definitions.definition: the range of products or services offered by a particular company or organization

wordOrigin: early 18th cent.: from Italian portafogli, from portare ‘carry’ + foglio ‘leaf’ (from Latin folium).
